body.p: The Board received 72 comment letters on the 2007 ED. After considering those comments, in December 2008 the Board published revised proposals in an exposure draft Relationships with the State (the 2008 ED). The 2008 ED:

li.p: presented revised proposals for state‑controlled entities; and
proposed one further amendment to the definition of a related party.
